author: James Martin
method: Place the salmon, trout and cream cheese and double cream into a blender.  Add the butter, cayenne pepper, lemon juice and seasoning.  Blend the mixture to a paste. Check the seasoning before removing from the blender. Put the paté in a dish and allow to set in the fridge.  Serve with salad leaves and toasted bread.
ingredients: 85g/3oz smoked salmon trimmings ,  85g/3oz smoked trout fillets ,  255g/9oz cream cheese ,  150ml/5fl oz double cream ,  1 tbsp chives ,  30g/1oz butter ,  ½ tsp cayenne pepper ,  1 lemon, juice only ,  freshly ground black pepper
